question:
A museum near your home is looking for people to do part-time voluntaryl unpaid work.you would like to do some voluntaryl unpaid work at the museum.
write a letter to the museum director to apply for the voluntaryl unpaid work.
in your letter
explain why you want to do voluntaryl unpaid work at the museum
describe some skills and qualities you have that would be usful
give detail of when you would be available for work
text: I am writing in connection with a part-time job in museum. My name is joe and i would like to apply for voluntary work.
First of all I want to tell you that I am a history student and your museum is famous for art and painting.So I would like to know more about this ancient art.

I am hoping that I will be a good choice as I have some knowledge of painting and I know few different languages as well. So I could become a tourist guide and explain to tourists about museums.I am open to learning as well if required so .
As I mentioned, I am a student so I will be available from 3 PM onwards Monday to Friday and 9 to 5 on weekends.
Hoping to see a favourable response.

error_list.error_des: The noun phrase museum seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
The pronoun I should always be capitalized.
It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase First of all. Consider adding a comma.
It seems that there is an article usage problem here.
